enrichment.title: Bulk Product Enrichment
enrichment.description: Upload your e-shop product export and let AI automatically extract and fill in product parameters.

upload.title: Upload File
upload.platformDescription: Select the e-commerce platform your export file is from.
upload.invalidFileType: Please upload a CSV or Excel file (.csv, .xlsx, .xls)
upload.fileTooLarge: File size must be less than {maxSize}MB
upload.exportInstructionsDescription: For the tool to work correctly, you need to export a file with specific columns.
upload.allowedColumnsDescription: You can include these columns in your export. Any other columns will cause an error.
upload.specialColumnsNote: Additionally, columns starting with filteringProperty: and textProperty are allowed.
upload.step4: In export settings, check only the allowed columns (see list above)
upload.step5: Download the export and upload it here

configuration.title: Enrichment Configuration
configuration.extractionModeDescription: Select what type of data you want to extract from product descriptions.
configuration.sourceColumnsDescription: Select which columns AI should analyze to extract parameters. More sources = better results.
configuration.generateFilteringDescription: Extract attributes for product filters (e.g. Color, Size, Material). Creates columns like
configuration.generateTextPropertiesDescription: Extract informational parameters (e.g. Warranty, Care). Uses format
configuration.productContextPlaceholder: Example: These are auto parts and accessories for Škoda vehicles. Products are intended for mechanics and car enthusiasts.
configuration.productContextDescription: Describe what kind of products these are. This helps AI better understand the context and extract relevant parameters.
configuration.extractionInstructionsDescription: Tell AI exactly what attributes to extract from products.
configuration.filteringInstructionsPlaceholder:
Examples:
- Color (e.g. Red, Blue, Green)
- Material (e.g. Cotton, Polyester, Leather)
- Size (e.g. S, M, L, XL)
- Brand
configuration.filteringInstructionsDescription: List the filtering parameters you want to extract. Be specific about expected values.
configuration.textInstructionsPlaceholder:
Examples:
- Warranty
- Product Care
- Dimensions
- Weight
- Country of Origin
configuration.textInstructionsDescription: List the informational parameters you want to extract. They will be formatted as Key;Value.
configuration.limitsDescription: Set the maximum number of parameters to extract.
configuration.clearExistingDescription: Remove all existing filteringProperty and textProperty columns and replace them with newly generated values.
configuration.generationModeDescription: Choose whether to generate only specified parameters, or let AI suggest additional relevant parameters.
configuration.generationModeStrictDescription: AI extracts only parameters you explicitly listed in the instructions above.
configuration.generationModeExpandDescription: AI extracts specified parameters and additionally suggests other relevant parameters found in descriptions.
configuration.strictModeRequiresInstructions: In "Only specified parameters" mode, you must enter at least one parameter in the instructions field above.

processing.title: Processing
processing.description: Process all {count} rows using AI extraction.
processing.processingNote: Processing may take several minutes depending on the number of rows.
processing.keepWindowOpen: Please keep this window open during processing. For large files, processing may take several minutes.
processing.errorsIncluded: These products were included in the output but don't have extracted parameters.

results.title: Enrichment Results
results.bulkActionsHint: Check parameters and click 'Delete' to remove from all products in category.
results.confirmDeleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete {count} parameter(s) from all {products} products in category?
results.selectCategory: Select a category for bulk actions

validation.emptyFields: shortDescription, description, name fields are empty

settings.title: Settings
settings.comingSoon: Settings and preferences will be available here in future updates.

profile.title: Profile Settings
profile.description: Manage your account settings and preferences
profile.name: Name

dashboardPage.title: Dashboard
dashboardPage.quickActionsHint: Navigate using the sidebar to access different features.

produkty.pageDescription: Automatically assign related and alternative products based on categories.

errors.selectAtLeastOne: Select at least one product type to assign

upload.invalidFileType: Please upload a file in .xlsx or .xls format

settings.title: Output settings
settings.selectAtLeastOne: Select at least one product type

stats.title: Data quality and statistics
stats.subtitle: Overview of processed data and recommendations
stats.smallCategoriesHint: We recommend expanding for better linking
stats.noAlternativeAssigned: These products don't have similar products assigned
stats.cannotAssignSimilar: Cannot assign similar products in the same subcategory

info.title: How does it work?
info.step1Description: File must contain only columns: code, defaultCategory, categoryText
info.keepItSimple: You don't need other columns, the more you add the more can break.
info.step2Description: For each product, up to 10 related and 10 similar products will be assigned
info.step3Description: File contains new columns relatedProduct1-10 and alternativeProduct1-10
info.step4Desc1: 1. In the left menu open "Products" and "Import"
info.step4Desc2: 2. In the import dialog change settings if needed
info.step4Desc3: 3. Select the newly downloaded file and click "Import" button at the top
info.warningText: If you already have related or similar products set up, importing the new file will overwrite and replace these values.
info.relatedDescription: Complementary products from the same main category
info.alternativeDescription: Product alternatives from the same product group

siteAudit.pageDescription: Complete website analysis - links, performance, HTML quality, configuration and security.
siteAudit.inputDescription: Enter the URL of the website you want to analyze

tooltips.overall: Average of all categories. 90+ = excellent, 70-89 = good, 50-69 = average, below 50 = needs improvement.
tooltips.links: Evaluates link functionality. Penalizes broken internal/external links, 404 pages and broken images.
tooltips.performance: Measures loading speed. Checks JS/CSS file count, lazy loading, render-blocking scripts and page size.
tooltips.html: HTML code quality. Checks headings (H1), image alt texts, empty links and proper structure.
tooltips.config: Technical configuration. Checks robots.txt, sitemap.xml, favicon, Open Graph and Twitter Card tags.
tooltips.security: Security aspects. Checks HTTPS, mixed content, external scripts and security headers.

contentAudit.pageDescription: Analyze product description quality, find duplicates, and check SEO parameters.

upload.title: Upload Product Feed
upload.description: Upload XLSX product export from Shoptet
upload.categoryFeedDescription: Upload category export in XLSX, CSV or XML format (optional)
upload.categoryFormats: Supported formats: XLSX, XLS, CSV, XML

errors.noProducts: No products found in the file

bannerGenerator.title: Banner Generator
bannerGenerator.description: Create info bars and banners for your e-shop without coding.

positions.topDesc: Fixed bar at the top of the page
positions.bottomLeftDesc: Floating box in the bottom left corner
positions.bottomRightDesc: Floating box in the bottom right corner

form.colorSchemeDesc: Select a preset color scheme or choose "Custom" and set colors manually below.
form.closeButtonDesc: Allow closing the bar (saves to localStorage)
form.dateError: Start date is after end date

preview.title: Preview
preview.closedMessage: Bar was closed. Switch mode to reset.

export.title: Code Export
export.copyError: Copy failed. Try again or copy manually.
export.step1Desc: Click the button below to download both files to your computer.
export.step2Note: Upload both downloaded files. Files will be saved to folder
export.step4Desc: In the same editor go to section:
export.step5Desc: Click Save in the HTML editor. The banner should appear on your e-shop immediately.
export.tipText: When updating the banner, just upload new files to File Manager – no need to change HTML code.
export.cacheNote: If changes don't appear, add ?v=2 to the path (e.g. info-lista.css?v=2)
export.inlineStep1: Go to Appearance & Content → Editor → HTML Code
export.inlineStep2: Paste code into Footer section (before closing BODY tag)
export.inlineNote: Code must be in BODY section. JavaScript will automatically move the banner to correct position.

categoryMapper.pageDescription: Automatically assign product categories for Heureka, Zboží.cz, Google Shopping and Glami.

platforms.title: Select Platforms
platforms.description: Choose which platforms you want to map categories for

upload.title: Upload Product Feed
upload.description: Upload an XLSX file with products
